fields.title: About Mario's Groupon
fields.content:
Mario's Groupon was created in December of 2009 with a goal of shifting the power into the buyer's hands to allow us to experience new and exciting things that our cities have to offer.

The concept is new to our cities and we think it is a perfect fit for our urban population. It‚Äôs pretty simple; we do our best to give people unbeatable deals everyday so they can comfortably try new and exciting things they may have not had a chance to try otherwise.

Without our community we're really nothing. We really encourage our users to get involved in our daily discussions, ask questions, share the deals through Twitter, Facebook and Email, and really help spread the word of collective buying!

fields.title: Contact Us
fields.content:
Question about today's deal?

We can try to help, but you should probably try the business first - you can find a link to their website on the main deal page.

Having trouble using Mario's Groupon?

Email Mario's Groupon at companyemail@mail.com

Feedback, Information, Business Partnerships, Etc.

Email info@company.com

fields.title: FAQ
fields.content:
What is {{ COMPANY_NAME }}?

Each day, Massive Coupon features an unbeatable deal on the best stuff to do, see, eat, and buy in your city. By promising businesses a minimum number of customers, we get discounts you won't find anywhere else. We call it "massive group buying power!"

Do I have to sign up a group of people I know to get the deal?

Nope - our hundreds of thousands of members make up a big enough group. You'll probably want to invite people anyway, though ‚Äî Massive Coupons are fun to use with friends, grandparents, and men who wear monocles.

I like today's deal - how do I get it?

Just click "BUY" before the offer ends at midnight. If the minimum number of people sign up, we'll charge your card and send you a link to print your Massive Coupon. If not enough people join, no one gets it (and you won't be charged), so invite your friends to make sure you get the deal!

fields.title: How It Works
fields.content:
{{COMPANY_NAME} brings you amazing deals on the coolest events, restaurants, fashion finds, activities and adventures. We can deliver great offers because we the power of the people to do massive group buying power.

How Does MassiveCoupon Work?

  1. We feature an amazing deal in your city available for a limited time
  2. You can only get the deal if enough people join the group - spread the word!
  3. If enough people join you get a printable electronic voucher
  4. Use the voucher to redeem your MassiveCoupon!


To join a group, click the ‚ÄúBuy Button‚Äù and follow the instructions. You will only be charged if the group is big enough. If you want the deal, spread the word far and wide because we can't get it unless we have enough people. You can share it easily using the social media links on each deal page.

Further questions? Please see the Frequently Asked Questions for more information.

Interested to know how MassiveCoupon can help your business? Click here to learn more.
